Name: Cobble Hill
Ingredients: 60 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof /50% alc./vol.)
Instructions: MUDDLE cucumber in base of stirring glass. Add other ingredients, STIR with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: Sam describes his drink as "a summertime Manhattan. Light and floral, as opposed to the heavy style of the classic Manhattan ."
History: Created in 2009 by Sam Ross at Milk & Honey in Manhattan, New York City.
